sub_title: Senior Data Manager| Customer Data, Insights and AI | Helping Booking.com to modernize their data architecture on top of public cloud infrastructure
summary:
I've embarked on a journey in the realm of "Data" right from the outset of my professional voyage. Over time, I've had the privilege of delving deep into the intricacies of the contemporary dilemmas we grapple with in effectively storing, processing, and analyzing vast volumes of data.

My experience encompasses a diverse array of data architectures, spanning the gamut from traditional data warehousing to cutting-edge data lakes. Currently, I'm fully immersed in the realm of modern data architectures, particularly focusing on data mesh and data fabric on top of public cloud infrastructures.

My professional trajectory has taken me across three continents, allowing me to collaborate with a plethora of esteemed national and international enterprises. Notably, my engagements have extended to multiple EMEA telecom operators, diverse players within the European financial sector, including various banks and recently in the e-commerce side. 

Throughout this voyage, I've come to a crucial realization — that there is no universally flawless data solution capable of addressing the myriad challenges that present themselves. Rather, each unique circumstance demands a tailored approach that aligns with its distinct requirements. Thus, adaptability remains key in effectively navigating this ever-evolving landscape.

An avid speaker, I frequently take the stage to discuss cutting-edge data topics. My speaking engagements encompass a spectrum of subjects, ranging from data architecture and management to the vital domain of data governance.

treasury_media.title: Latest Trends Within Social Engineering@TechEx Europe
treasury_media.description:
Mahmoud Yassin from Booking.com, Sunette Runhaar, from Uber and Maikel Ninaber, from Mastercard will all be joining us in Amsterdam on 26 - 27 September.
 
They will be on the panel discussing the Latest Trends Within Social Engineering. Exploring the damaging consequences which social engineering brings to an organisation, analysing common misconceptions people may have when it comes to engaging with threat actors.

projects.title: Vodafone Promotions Platform
projects.description:
Online system that you can develop complex and near impossible promotion for Vodafone customers.
Built with an amazing architecture design that gives you the ability to offer any kind of promotions to you customers either simple or complex promo. Very generic and gives you unlimited possibilities to increase the company revenue.
You can create a promotion that consists of levels, each level can hold any type of offers from ( usages, inactivity , demographics ...etc ) as the system can calculate any type of activities and combine them together.

authors.headline: Senior Data Manager| Customer Data, Insights and AI | Helping Booking.com to modernize their data architecture on top of public cloud infrastructure
Senior Data Manager| Customer Data, Insights and AI | Helping Booking.com to modernize their data architecture on top of public cloud infrastructure

profile_positions.description:
-Lead transformation efforts at Booking.com to transition into a data-driven company with a strong emphasis on data management.

-Implementing state-of-the-art data management tools and technologies to revolutionize how Booking.com utilizes data in acontrolled, secure, and compliant manner.

-Working across all Booking business lines to enforce data standards, best practices and current/future/transaction state of data architecture.

-Spearheading the modernization of Booking.com's infrastructure by leveraging public cloud technologies, enabling the company to capitalize on the rapid pace of innovation and maintain its position as a leader in the travel industry
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Manager

profile_positions.description:
Building ABN AMRO data mesh architecture where I mainly responsible for:

- Building a central data marketplace portal where all the stockholders can interact and unlock the potential of data analytics. All the way from defining the use case, enriching it with the golden datasets that is required to empower the business needs up and including the data sharing agreements, the data delivery agreements, access management, lineage and analytics using state of the art domain data stores where the analytics via business intelligence tools or artificial intelligence techniques can be achieved. All of this is offered in a self service way to empower and ownership and make the data democratization a click of a button.

- Data security product group that includes products like digital data sharing agreements and data masking/depersonalization to support both fine grain access to the data and support the privacy of the data taking into consideration the GDPR rules and the regulatory requirements. 

- Data lineage product group that includes building a central metadata lake where we collect all kind of metadata (business, technical and operational) into a one place where we can stitch the data together to support the data lineage need of the bank and also the external regulations such as BCBS-239
profile_positions.title: Lead Data Architect

profile_positions.description:
1. Big Data Project Leadership:
   Led cross-functional teams to successfully launch big data and data science projects into Production, collaborating with architects, product owners, and engineers.

2. Strategic Architecture Planning:
   Designed and executed a forward-looking product architecture roadmap that balanced big data integrity with rapid value delivery.

3. Centralized Data Marketplace:
   Pioneered a multiyear effort to establish a user-friendly Data Marketplace, overseeing key components such as data access, security, cataloging, wrangling, and metadata management.

4. Collaborative Decision-Making:
   Collaborated across bank teams to make informed decisions that aligned with ABN AMRO's objectives.

5. End-to-End Implementation:
   Managed end-to-end data implementations, ensuring precision and troubleshooting complex issues.

6. Data Strategy Enhancement:
   Worked alongside solution architects to elevate data quality, strategy, and governance within the Hadoop ecosystem.

7. Architectural Guidance:
   Mentored teams, guiding architectural direction and principle adoption.

8. Stakeholder Engagement:
   Collaborated with internal and external stakeholders, delivering high-quality applications aligned with their needs.

9. Solution Adoption Advocate:
   Partnered with business leaders to drive seamless adoption of innovative solutions.

10. Hadoop Ecosystem Expert:
    Leveraged Hortonworks and third-party technologies to architect a robust Hadoop ecosystem supporting the bank's data-driven vision.
profile_positions.title: Senior Big Data Architect

profile_positions.description:
Working for the largest Bank in the Nordic countries as a data architect in the financial crime area and anti-money laundry program.

We try to identify, classify and prevent any domestic or international transfer related to (politically exposed persons, terrorists, drug dealers or any suspicions transfer).

We are operating in more than 10 countries across the Nordic region, Eastern Europe, UK and china. 
We evaluate every customer via complicated algorithms to give each one a risk score to maintain our customer KYC model (Know you customer). 

Working on state of the art system that detects any suspicious behavior against money laundry or financial crime area. 

Our work is to keep the bank in an outstanding position when it comes to regulatory rules or customer satisfaction. 

My function is mainly around one important program: 
( Data intelligence, data analytics and data governance )

1- Building the data standards and identifying the correct data steward, data custodian and data councils.
2- Designing and building a powerful data dictionary around the financial crime area.
3- Designing the best data models to support business needs.
4- Working with different systems form RDBMS to Hadoop to fulfill business needs.
5- Reviewing the overall architecture from data and technology point of view.
6- Suggesting the best data governance approaches to a data driven bank.
7- Create and evolve IT architectures for an area, aligned to the organization s business and IT strategy.
8- Secure understanding of the important factors for Business and IT within own area, and their impact on the architecture.
9- Guide and govern standards, principles and best practices to better achieve organizational objectives.
10- Driving IT architectural change, data integration, ETL and data foundation.
11- Data modelling, data analysis of large sets.
profile_positions.title: Data Architect

profile_positions.description:
Working with state of the art tools to support STC different teams with the needed data from the data warehouse.

Converting customers needs to technical models that can support their requirements in a generic and reusable way.

Building new DWH models and changing existing models as per the needed change with taking into consideration the model integrity.

ETL expert: sourcing all the needed data from ODS or any other system to the data warehouse with following STC standards. 

Extracting, transforming and loading the data into the target tables via lots of Teradata tools (FastLoad , MultiLoad , BTEQ and FastExport).

Working with DataSatge and Ab-Initio as ETL tools for CLDM 12 upgrade.

Working on Teradata CLDM 7 and Teradata CLDM 12 to support customer needs.

Testing and doing quality checks for all the deliverable. 

Analyzing customer needs and map it into a technical plan.
profile_positions.title: Data Warehouse Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Managing team of BI developers to deliver BI solutions. 

Analyzing customer needs and ensure fully understand of customer current needs. 

Mapping customer needs to a professional design that can fit their needs. 

Controlling project scope and budget according to the project contract. 

Facilitating contact between all the project stockholders. 

Ensuring the professional delivery for the functional and nonfunctional requirements. 

Build strong relationship with the clients to facilitate the project progress and for building customer trust.

Runs complex projects/programs from design and development to production.

Defines requirements and plan project life cycle deployment.

Defines resources and schedule for project/program implementation.

Create strategies for risk mitigation and contingency planning.

Plans and schedule project deliverable, goals, milestones.

Performs team assessments and evaluations.

Efficiently identifies and solves project issues.

Demonstrates leadership to define requirements for project risk.

Develop Requests for Proposals (RFP) for external services.

Designs and maintain technical and project documentation.

Strong organizational, presentation, and customer service skills.

Responsible of gathering business requirements from all the different involved teams and start analyzing the needed data availability. 
Set with team members and initiate the design process. 
Developing -if needed- the solution and fully test it against the requirements. 
Ensuring professional delivery to the business with the needed level of accuracy. 
Mapping data from source to destination systems and ensuring maximum needed accuracy. 
Involved in Teradata migration project. 
Developing BI solutions.

Developing in-house big projects to support Vodafone very needs. 
Achieving major milestones in the area of data warehousing throughout designing and building major models. 
Heavy DataStage development projects. 
Designing and developing ETL processes. 
Moving to online data warehousing using state of the art tools.

Key person on developing many in-house applications that still running on production till now and give support to customers over 40 (M).

volunteer_experiences.description: Supporting and Managing team of volunteers to help orphan children face the real life and trying to make them more confident and more secure. Trying to be like older brothers to them and let them talk to us and be part of their life. Also, lots of other activities like teaching and coaching for them.
